description: A futuristic and sleek UI design system for showcasing team members or 'legends'. The design is characterized by a dark theme, a structured grid layout, and vibrant neon blue glowing effects that create a high-tech, digital aesthetic.

primary.name: primary-background
primary.description: Very dark navy/purple, used for the main background.

accent-glow.name: bright-cyan-glow
accent-glow.description: A vivid, glowing cyan used for borders, frames, and accents.

text-primary.name: primary-text
text-primary.description: Pure white for main titles and names.

text-secondary.name: secondary-text
text-secondary.description: A light grey for subtitles and body descriptions.

text-accent.name: accent-text-cyan
text-accent.description: Bright cyan for role titles to make them stand out.

avatar-background.name: avatar-bg-gradient-start
avatar-background.description: Darker purple for the top of the avatar background gradient.

avatar-background-end.name: avatar-bg-gradient-end
avatar-background-end.description: Darker base purple for the bottom of the avatar background gradient.

typography.fontFamily: Sans-Serif, preferably a modern, geometric font like 'Roboto' or 'Techno'

layout.gridSystem: A responsive grid, primarily a 3-column layout for the profile cards on wider screens.

section-header.name: main-header-block
section-header.description: The top section containing the main title and subtitle.

decorative-frame.name: header-border-accent
decorative-frame.description: The futuristic, glowing line-art frame at the top of the section.

team-grid.name: profile-card-grid
team-grid.description: The main container that holds and aligns the grid of profile cards.

profile-card.name: team-member-card
profile-card.description: An individual card for a team member, containing their avatar and information.

card-frame.name: profile-card-border
card-frame.description: The glowing, rectangular border for each profile card.

avatar.name: profile-avatar-display
avatar.description: The circular element that contains the character's image.

grid-connectors.name: network-connector-lines
grid-connectors.description: The decorative, dotted lines that connect the profile cards, creating a networked feel.
